text: Ðis sind þa landgemæra æt Wilmanlehtune ærest æt cranmere & of þæn mære andlang broces.
And of þan þorne andlang ðære stræte in on hore pyt of þan pytte on ðane blacan pyt þonan on langdune ende of langandun swa to ðan hlæwe.
Of ðæn hlæwe to þære sealtstræt & efter stræte to wilman forda.
Of wilman forde on cyneferþes pyt þonan in þa hwitan dic.
Of ðære dic andlang hricg weges<../images/tbar.gif>in cran meres broce andlang broces in to cranmere.
